description: Brandon doesn't look innocent and damn, he sure as hell isn't.  He's one bad ass dude with a big attitude and an ever bigger dick!There's a fearless confidence in that deep voice that can only come from having perfectly rounded smooth pecs, killer arms, etched abs and of course, nine thick, rock hard  inches easily as fat as flashlight! No drawn out strip tease here, Brandon is as anxious to show off that incredible torso as we were to see it. His boxers didn't stay on for long either as he unveils a thick dangling piece of meat that is easily as big sift as some of the erections we've seen and even then, he's still , most definitely, a grower!The ink on his arm dances as he flexes those sculpted arms with a hydraulic grip on that mighty meat until he rapid fires some of thickest ropes of cum we've ever seen until that flat stomach is stamped with a triple scoop of bad boy juice.
title: The Crowd Pleaser, Scene #01
